code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import FrenchFlag from"../../assets/france.svg";import SpanishFlag from"../../assets/spain.svg";import EnglishFlag from"../../assets/united-kingdom.svg";import PalestineFlag from"../../assets/ps.svg";import"./ToggleLangs.css";import{Context}from"../../context/langContext";import"bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ToggleLangs(){const{setLang}=useContext(Context);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-langs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"lang-flag img-fluid",onClick:()=>setLang("FR"),src:FrenchFlag,alt:"French Flag"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"lang-flag img-fluid",onClick:()=>setLang("EN"),src:EnglishFlag,alt:"English Flag"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"lang-flag img-fluid",onClick:()=>setLang("ES"),src:SpanishFlag,alt:"Spanish Flag"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"lang-flag img-fluid",onClick:()=>setLang("PL"),src:PalestineFlag,alt:"Palestine Flag"})]});}
